General.Name: Stampede Drilling Inc
General.Description: Stampede Drilling Inc. provides drilling rig services for the oil and natural gas industry in North America. It provides drilling rig services in southeast Saskatchewan and Alberta; and operational management services in the United States. It operates a fleet of telescopic double drilling rigs. The company was formerly known as MATRRIX Energy Technologies Inc. and changed its name to Stampede Drilling Inc. in May 2019. Stampede Drilling Inc. was incorporated in 2011 and is headquartered in Calgary, Canada.
General.Address: Bow Valley Square IV, Calgary, AB, Canada, T2P 3H7
